org.mapdb
Class Volume.FileChannelVol

java.lang.Object
  org.mapdb.Volume
      org.mapdb.Volume.FileChannelVol
Enclosing class:
Volume
public static final class Volume.FileChannelVol
extends Volume

Volume which uses FileChannel. Uses global lock and does not use mapped memory.
